document_title: Benign kidney tumors: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
Not all benign kidney tumors require treatment. If the patient's tumor is small and does not cause any symptoms, the doctor may prescribe some periodic monitoring measures. If the doctor prescribes treatment, the specific method will depend on the location of the tumor, the risk of affecting internal organs, nerves, blood vessels... (3)
1. Laparoscopic surgery
Tumor surgery is often performed using endoscopic techniques to limit the risk of invasion, make smaller incisions, reduce bleeding and shorten recovery time. When performing this method, the patient may need to stay in the hospital for 1-2 days to wait for stabilization and discharge.
2. Open surgery
Recovery time after open surgery is proportional to the level of invasive intervention. After the tumor has been removed, the patient may need occupational therapy or specialized care to address the problems left by the tumor.
If surgery cannot safely reach the tumor, your doctor may prescribe additional methods to reduce the size of the tumor or prevent its growth.

With the leading modern machinery and equipment system in the country and the region; Operating room meets international standards; Along with a 5-star boarding area and high-class service... The Urology and Nephrology Center stands out with examination, screening and treatment services for all urinary tract diseases. From common surgeries to major high-tech surgeries. These include laparoscopic kidney stone surgery, kidney transplant, tumor resection to preserve kidney parenchyma; Radical nephrectomy; Radical prostatectomy; total bladder resection and small bowel cystoplasty; adrenalectomy; shaping urinary tract defects... Diagnosis - medical and surgical treatment of all male diseases.

Call the hotline 0287 102 6789 - 093 180 6858 (HCMC) or 024 3872 3872 - 024 7106 6858 (Hanoi) to register for a private medical appointment with a specialist, through the customer service staff.; Register for a medical appointment with any doctor you trust at the link: https://tamanhhospital.vn/danh-cho-khach-hang/dat-lich-kham/; Send a message on Tam Anh General Hospital Fanpage or Tam Anh General Hospital Urology and Andrology Fanpage; Text message via Zalo OA of Tam Anh General Hospital.
In terms of scientific principles, benign kidney tumors are not malignant and are not dangerous to the patient's health. However, in some cases benign tumors can still transform into malignant tumors due to changes in cell structure. Therefore, each of us should take health care seriously, build a healthy lifestyle and have regular health check-ups or as prescribed to manage the disease actively and effectively.
